description:
As a customer
  I can go checkout with message of limitation alert
name: Checkout - Shopping Cart Promotion Reminder

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Setting Page
I should see promotion reminder toggle
I check and click promotion reminder toggle off
promotion reminder toggle should be checked
I click on update button
I should see alert
I am on Free Shipping Index Page
I click on add promotion button
I should be redirected to Free Shipping Create Page
I fill '(dirty data) Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200' to name field

embeddings.data: {"value":"(dirty data) Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200"}

steps.name: I click on subtotal condition checkbox
I fill '200' to promotion condition field
I click on countinue to button
I click on 2nd countinue to button
I click on unlimited checkbox
I fill '3' to limited field
I click on 3rd countinue to button
I scroll down to preview button
I click on preview button
promotion name should contain 'Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"(dirty data) Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200","expectText":"Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200"}

steps.name: coupon code should equal to 'N/A'
promotion limitations start date should contain start date
promotion limitations end date should contain 'Never expires'
total usage limit should equal to '3 time(s)'
target group should equal to 'All Customers'
discount summary should contain 'Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200","expectText":"Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200"}

steps.name: I click on confirm button
I should be redirected to Free Shipping Index Page
I should see alert
1st row of free shipping list should contain 'Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"(dirty data) Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200 All Products2021/08/27 02:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 0 / 3 Usage Record Edit","expectText":"Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200"}

steps.name: I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input '18th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain "18th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for CheckoutNT$100","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
unapplied promotion should contain 'Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"More promotions are waiting for you to enjoy:Continue ShoppingPromotion(dirty data) Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200 Buy NT$100 more to enjoy free shipping","expectText":"Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200"}

steps.name: I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input '18th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain "18th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"18th Product for CheckoutNT$100","expectText":"18th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I should not see unapplied promotion
I click on login button
I should be redirected to Shop Login Page
I fill email to email field
I fill password to password field
I click on submit button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select language dropdown option included 'English' of language dropdown
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
language dropdown should contain 'English'
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included 'Local Delivery' of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery"],"text":"Local Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included 'Custom' of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["CVS via O'Pay","Taishin","Credit Card via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Bank Transfer","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)"],"text":"Custom"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I check contact number field and fill phone
I check and click save number checkbox
I click on same as checkbox
I select address region dropdown option included 'Taipei City' of address region dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["            State/City\n          ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County"],"text":"Taipei City"}

steps.name: I select address district dropdown option included '100 Zhongzheng District' of address district dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["            District\n          ","100 Zhongzheng District","103 Datong District","104 Zhongshan District","105 Songshan District","106 Da'an District","108 Wanhua District","110 Xinyi District","111 Shilin District","112 Beitou District","114 Neihu District","115 Nangang District","116 Wenshan District"],"text":"100 Zhongzheng District"}

steps.name: I fill address to delivery address field
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I click on summary collapse
delivery fee should contain 'NT$0'
I am on Orders Page
I click on 1st row of order links
I should be redirected to Orders Show Page
order date should contain order date
delivery fee should contain "NT$0"
---ROLL BACK---
I am on Promotion Setting Page
I click on promotion reminder toggle
promotion reminder toggle should not be checked
I click on update button
I should see alert
I am on Free Shipping Index Page
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select delete of bulk actions dropdown
I should see confirmation popover
I click on delete checkbox
I click on confirm delete button
I should see alert
row of free shipping list should not contain 'Enjoy free shipping with purchase over NT$200'
